mapper.select: select count(*) from t_supply_type st where st.supplyTypeStatus = 'Y'

select st.*,cp.companyId,cp.companyName from auto_platform.t_supply_type st LEFT JOIN auto_platform.t_company cp on st.companyId=cp.companyId where st.supplyTypeStatus = 'Y'
limit #{beginIndex}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from t_supply_type st where st.supplyTypeStatus = 'N'

select st.*,cp.companyId,cp.companyName from auto_platform.t_supply_type st LEFT JOIN auto_platform.t_company cp on st.companyId=cp.companyId where st.supplyTypeStatus = 'N'
limit #{beginIndex}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into auto_platform.t_supply_type(supplyTypeId, supplyTypeName, companyId, supplyTypeDes,supplyTypeStatus) values(uuid(),#{supplyTypeName},#{companyId},#{supplyTypeDes},'Y')
mapper.update: UPDATE auto_platform.t_supply_type SET supplyTypeName=#{supplyTypeName},companyId=#{companyId}, supplyTypeDes=#{supplyTypeDes} WHERE supplyTypeId=#{supplyTypeId}
update auto_platform.t_supply_type set supplyTypeStatus = 'N' where supplyTypeId = #{supplyTypeId}
update auto_platform.t_supply_type set supplyTypeStatus = 'Y' where supplyTypeId = #{supplyTypeId}
